settings.heading: LOOKING FOR ANIMATION & MOTION DESIGNERS?
settings.sub: Then you are in the right place! We have the talent, You have the dream.

settings.heading: We are a virtual team passionate about video creation
settings.sub-text2: We have experienced candidates who will make your site good looking and interesting for the target auditory using animation and motion design techniques.

settings.heading_3rd_section: You dream it, we create it
settings.sub_heading_3rd_section: Animated videos and short films are great ways to draw attention and deliver more information in a short time without overloading viewers. We can create something special for you.

settings.instruments_subtitle: Our candidates use visual effects, animation and other cinematic techniques to bring life to their creations. with the best motion graphic tools, such as:

settings.creators_subtitle: Check out CVs and portfolios of animation & motion designers to find the person who will help you to fulfill all your ideas and plans. Contact us, in case you have any questions.

settings.item_title:
Our remote video editors work with different internal and international projects. They challenge themselves every day and try new ways to implement ideas, understand the main concepts of quality video creation.

Our employees are persistent and result oriented with a passion for video design. Working every day in Adobe Premiere Pro, After Effects and Sony Vegas virtual editors enhance their skills and boost creativity. Using these tools they can complete various color correction, multi-camera videos, apply filters. Adobe Audition helps them to improve sound, create mashups, and add different music effects. Adobe After Effect helps them to create promos, animations, make color, and image correction. We use this universal tool for any crazy idea.

With the help of their skills dedicated video editors can create movies, promos, social media/website video content. If you need dynamic visuals for your company’s or personal promotion, we can help with that as well. Virtual editors can work with raw material or an existing one.

Contact us, we’ll discuss your needs and will find the best candidate for you!

settings.title: Skills are important. We know that.

settings.heading: Make your social media ads shine
settings.description: Social media are an integral part of our daily life. The amount of active users is enormous — 3.8 billion people. So, it’s not weird that nowadays if you want to have a profit you have to promote your brand on various social platforms. It is also a well-known fact that video advertisements bring more engagement than any other type. They catch attention better, encouraging communication with the brand. The right created video image is more likely to stay in people's minds and can help customers tie your ads with your product.

settings.title: What happens when you combine video and social media? Profit.
settings.text:
Remote Video Editors is a dedicated, creative team that is going to make great visual materials for your ad campaigns using animation, motion design, 3D, and even more.

We can work with your projects and materials or create a new one from the scratch. Virtual employees can develop existing ideas or come up with their own as well.

If you need something particular, don’t worry. Our employees are always up to interesting, challenging tasks. They will go into it and will try their best to come up with a decent, unusual solution.

Experienced in Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, etc. they can manage to create different formats of motion ads just for your business’ needs.

settings.privacy_content: We only collect personally identifiable information from you when you log into our site or enter information into our form fields. You may be asked to enter your: name, e-mail address, mailing address or phone number.

settings.privacy_title: What do we use your information for?
settings.privacy_content:
Any of the information we collect from you may be used in one of the following ways:

● To personalize your experience

Your information helps us to better respond to your individual needs

● To improve our website

We continually strive to improve our website offerings based on the information and feedback we receive from you

● To improve customer service

Your information helps us to more effectively respond to your customer service requests and support needs

● To send periodic emails

The email address you provide may be used by automated, trigger-based email campaigns to send you information, respond to inquiries, and/or other requests or questions

● To contact you

If you request that we contact you

settings.privacy_title: How do we protect your information?
settings.privacy_content: We implement a variety of security measures to maintain the safety of your personal information when you enter, submit, or access your personal information. Your information is stored in a password protected database.

Yes, Cookies are small files that a site or its service provider transfers to your computers hard drive through your Web browser (if you allow) that enables the sites or service providers systems to recognize your browser and capture and remember certain information.

We use cookies to help us remember, understand and save your preferences for future visits and compile aggregate data about site traffic and site interaction so that we can offer better site experiences and tools in the future. This information is collected in an anonymous form that includes no personally identifiable information. No personally identifiable information is collected on this website unless that information is explicitly submitted via a fill-in form.

Cookies are also used to display remarketing advertisements, based upon the user’s previous visits to https://v-edstore.myshopify.com/, across the internet.

Remarketing advertisements are displayed through Google’s display-advertisement network. Users may opt out of Google’s use of cookies at any time by visiting the Google Ads Preferences Manager.

settings.privacy_title: Do we disclose any information to outside parties?
settings.privacy_content: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer to outside parties your personally identifiable information. This does not include trusted third parties who assist us in operating our website, conducting our business, or servicing you, so long as those parties agree to keep this information confidential. We may also release your information when we believe release is appropriate to comply with the law, enforce our site policies, or protect ours or others rights, property, or safety. However, non-personally identifiable visitor information may be provided to other parties for marketing, advertising, or other uses.

Occasionally, at our discretion, we may include or offer third party products or services on our website. These third party sites have separate and independent privacy policies. We therefore have no responsibility or liability for the content and activities of these linked sites. Nonetheless, we seek to protect the integrity of our site and welcome any feedback about these sites.
This online privacy policy applies only to information collected through our website and not to information collected offline.
Please also visit our Terms and Conditions section establishing the use, disclaimers, and limitations of liability governing the use of our website at v-edstore.myshopify.com
By using our site, you consent to our websites privacy policy.
If we decide to change our privacy policy, we will post those changes on this page.

settings.title: Contacting Us
settings.words: If there are any questions regarding this privacy policy you may contact us using the information below.

settings.hero_title: Create a green screen video with our chroma key specialists.
settings.hero_text: Our company’s green screen video production team will create a perfect chromakey video for your project to get you ahead of your competitors.

settings.services_title: Check out the green screen production services that we offer.
settings.services_text: Green screen technology is a perfect low-budget solution for high-quality production videos. With the help of our skillful green screen video makers, you can create an excellent chroma key video for your project. Our chroma key specialists will composite two video streams together, create a wide-angle scene and provide service of adding a green background with a speaker presence. So entrust our video makers with your project, and we will deliver the best results following your requirements.

settings.card_text: Business green screen video - chroma keying videos for businesses, startups, etc.
Youtube green screen video - making a green screen video for your youtube channel.

settings.types_title: Look through the types of chroma key videos our team produces.

settings.purpose_title: Pick a green screen production service for your project's purpose.
settings.purpose_text: Nowadays, almost every major video production process includes green screen effects. It’s cheaper than going out of your way to shoot a video in a specific location, with the noise and distractions from the surrounding environment. That is why chroma key services are needed in many fields of video production. For example, you can order a chroma key for google meet to get quality videos with original background or a green screen for online teaching to make your lessons more exciting and get your student’s attention.

settings.hero_text: Subtitles improve viewers' comprehension of content and make videos more accessible for people with special needs that require text accompaniment

settings.intro_title: Make your video content easier to engage with through subtitling
settings.intro_text: Movies, educational videos, etc. — no matter the purpose, they are a big part of our lives. And now we consume more video content than ever. That is why you should insert subtitles in your videos.
settings.intro_text2: With it, video content is much easier to understand, especially in a situation where attentive listening may be difficult or when a video is not in your first language you’re trying to improve. Not only that, but the subtitles may also help people with hearing problems or attentive disorders, thus making your video content more inclusive and helping you expand your audience, if that’s your goal.

settings.hero_title: BALANCE THE TONE OF YOUR VIDEO WITH THE HELP OF OUR FILM COLORIST
settings.hero_text: Color correction it’s a process used in photography, videos, television, cinematography that uses filters to fix tones or correct saturation

settings.chromatic_text: Color correction in the film is explained by the fact that the material shot under different lighting conditions has a different color rendition.
In addition, color adjustments can partially correct imperfections during shooting.  It would help if you adjusted color
In addition, color adjustments can partially correct imperfections during shooting.  It would help if you adjusted color
That's why color correction in the video can be helpful.

settings.step_description: Pre-production, which is the planning stage for mapping out your strategy and script for the video, film processing, and post-production.
The post-production process includes video cutting for a better video effect and  video framing for constructing the act, process, or style of putting together a frame.
With the help of video-framing you can decide what exactly you want to show the viewers. Well-framed video looks right to the viewer and seems more natural.

settings.heading: The most popular platforms where you may need slow motion.
settings.text: Time-lapse is a spectacular way to demonstrate not only incredible but also inconspicuous, at first glance, moments. Fortunately, you can improve the quality of your video on almost all online platforms. For example, with slow-motion on Instagram, you can slow down your video quickly and easily online without buying expensive or complicated editing software. Using slow-motion on Snapchat, you can reduce the speed of your video so people can catch the little details, like a dog shaking off. The same widespread phenomenon is slow-motion in broadcasting.
